caseName: Grant v. Capital Management Services, L.P.
firm: Ellis, LaVoie, Poirier, Steinheimer, & McGee, LLP

recap_documents.description: ORDER: The joint motion for preliminary approval of class action settlement (Doc.  111 ) is granted. The settlement class is certified for settlement purposes only under Rule 23(b)(2). The Court appoints Plaintiff Wade Grant as class representative.  The Court appoints Frantz Law Group, APLC, Adler Law Group, APLC, and Keegan & Baker, LLP as class counsel. A hearing shall be held on 1/31/2014 at 09:30 AM. All papers in support of the final approval of the settlement shall be filed with the Court on or before 1/20/2014. Signed by Judge William Q. Hayes on 12/11/2013. (mdc)
